formalText: They come home and put their wallet and keys in the same spot every time so they don't lose them things like that.
There is wonder if the difficulties with the intention and even organization can be related to depression and anxiety.
There is concern that too many kid are misdiagnosed by pediatricians with ADHD.
They have an appointment with someone who is good at diagnosing this stuff or is able. They are amusing they are good based off the fact that their is a 6 month waiting period.
The son is  fighting for their  attention when the daughter is playing with her.
Sunday morning was one of those days that they got anxious about taking Ian snowboarding
They are worried about selling the concern tickets when people want to watch the game.
They have been wondering how different their life would be if they do have ADD and it was found sooner.
They blame the clinician for picking things up about their mental health.
They got a prescription for Adderall.
They probably start it in a day
They have taken stimulants before in college, ephedrine when it was legal.
That's not out in the woods where Jess is freaking out about Lyme disease.
That's going to be the interesting thing next summer, whether they will go on an overnight in the woods.
